solution_line_template: She puts on {num_facial_products} products that take {minutes_per_product_application} minutes each so it takes her {num_facial_products}*{minutes_per_product_application} = <<{num_facial_products}*{minutes_per_product_application}={time_for_products}>>{time_for_products} minutes

It takes {time_for_products} minutes to put the products on and an additional {additional_makeup_time} minutes for her make-up so all total it takes her {time_for_products}+{additional_makeup_time} = <<{time_for_products}+{additional_makeup_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
